comment.text: The "DefaultQuota" translation key is used to display the label for the default quota option in a filter section. It appears on a page where users can customize their filters and provides an alternative label when the default quota option is selected. This text should be translated to provide a consistent user experience across different languages.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "Կանխադրված քվոտա" (Kanxadrvats kvota) is a possible translation for "Default quota", it leans more towards "Predefined quota" or "Preset quota." "Default" often implies a standard or baseline value, which isn't perfectly captured by "Կանխադրված".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider "Սկզբային քվոտա" (Sgzbvain kvota) for a more accurate translation of "Default quota," implying a starting or initial quota.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "デフォルトな容量制限" is technically correct but sounds unnatural. While "デフォルト" (default) and "容量制限" (capacity limit) are accurate, the addition of "な" makes the phrase sound awkward in Japanese. A more natural translation would focus on a more concise and idiomatic expression.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: デフォルトの制限 (Deforuto no seigen) - 'Default Limit' or デフォルト制限 (Deforuto seigen) - 'Default Limit'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Sinhala translation "පෙරනිමි සලාකය" does not accurately convey the meaning of "Default quota". "පෙරනිමි" (peranim) suggests a prior or previous state, and "සලාකය" (salakaya) is a less common word. A more accurate translation would reflect a standard or pre-set limit.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A better translation might be "තsetDefault quota" (dēsathwaya kotawa) or "සාමාන්‍ය කොට්ටාව" (samanaya kotawa).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "Подразумевана квота" is technically a valid translation, it carries a connotation of 'implied quota' or 'assumed quota' which isn't precisely what 'Default quota' means. A more accurate translation would emphasize the standard or pre-defined nature of the quota.
